metadata.synopsis: A dialogue with one of the "guards" in House of Hope. These are Eternal Debtors, each one has a story how did they manage to get into Raphael's hands. ImpDebtors behave a bit differently: they observe everyone and will watch at players constantly.These characters see players as "guests" of House of Hope and they don't know anything about players.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. Talk to Hope in House of Hope and promise to helpteleport S_LOW_HouseOfHope_HopeIntroduction_Trigger3. Talk to Eternal Debtorteleport S_LOW_HouseOfHope_ImpDebtor02

0.speaker: Visionary Eternal Debtor
0.text: Can you see with eye pieces? Can you cry? Can the jellied gouts be whole again? I want to know. I want to see.
0.context: NodeContext: Delirious/mounting fervour as the line continues

1.speaker: Visionary Eternal Debtor
1.text: He said he'd turn my eyes in on themselves. To see inside me. Rolling and rolling until they burst.
1.context: NodeContext: Delirious/mounting fervour as the line continues
